basic.floral_language:
Crassula rogersii 
Floriography: lovely, brave, gentle
Has leaves in half olive shape covered with dense hairs, in a cool season with adequate light, leaves turn red, and more plump. May be grown individually in a pot. When in a water stress, branches become woodier with a more charming look. 
Likes sunny places, take a short sleep in summer, need reduce watering and shade properly under B116scattered light and water control. Flowers sometimes with light green flowers.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, light green flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, with strong light leaf turn to red

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, a short period of dormancy in summer, use half shade for better care
maintenance.watering: Do not water frequently, keep a dry environment, water every 7-10 days
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once every month
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
